p: Thymol or paramethyl-isopropyl-phenol is the main bioactive compounds of the plant essential oils as Artemisia capillaris, Marrubium vulgare L and Thymus capitatus essential oils. Thymol was shown that had a hepatoprotective activity against CCl 4 induced liver toxicity in mice. In fact, the administration of thymol at a dose 300 mg/kg in mice, shown an inhibition of LPO that induced by CCl 4 [ 81].
